text: “Eghtɨ Israelɨn ikɨzimɨn gumaziba o amiziba, o Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizir uan kantri ategha iza Israelia ko itiba, akɨrim ragh na gasaragh uan navim isɨ asebar anigam, eghtɨ arazir kam bangɨn men arazir kuraba mangɨ bar ekeveghtɨ, me uan aseba bar dagh ifongegh da ataghɨraghan aghuagh, egh me pura izɨ nɨghnɨziba bagh nan akam inigha izir gumazimɨn azangsɨgham, eghtɨ kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ uabɨ men ikarvazim me danɨngam.
